product_summary: Sketch is an AI code-writing assistant that understands the context of your data, greatly improving the relevance of suggestions. Sketch is usable in seconds and doesn't require adding a plugin to your IDE.
product_pros: Easy to use, no plugin required
Saves time by automating code writing
product_cons: Not as flexible as some other AI code-writing tools
Can be difficult to learn to use
May not be suitable for all types of coding tasks

product_usecases.details: Sketch can be used to clean data by identifying and removing errors and inconsistencies.
Sketch can be used to generate new features from existing data.
Sketch can be used to generate code to train machine learning models.
Sketch can be used  to generate code for a variety of tasks, such as data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.
Sketch can be used to perform natural language processing tasks, such as text classification, sentiment analysis, and machine translation.

product_toolfor.details: Sketch is a valuable tool for data scientists who need to quickly and easily clean, analyze, and visualize data.
Sketch can help machine learning engineers to automate the process of training and deploying models.
Sketch can help software developers to write better code, faster.
Sketch can be used to improve the efficiency and accuracy of any task that involves working with data.
Sketch is a great tool for students who are learning about data science, machine learning, or software development.

product_pricing: Sketch offers a free tier and a paid tier. The free tier includes 100 minutes of usage per month. The paid tier starts at $29 per month and includes unlimited usage.
